# DocStratum Project

> A comprehensive documentation ecosystem demonstrating proper file organization, internal linking, and metadata structure for LLM-friendly documentation.

## Master Index

- [Getting Started](getting-started.md): Quick start guide for new users
- [API Reference](api-reference.md): Complete API documentation and method signatures
- [Configuration](configuration.md): Configuration options and environment setup

## Core Concepts

This ecosystem contains an aggregate file with complete documentation.

- [LLM Full Index](llms-full.txt): Complete aggregated documentation

## Examples

Refer to the Getting Started guide for practical examples and tutorials.
